title: Looking for a 5 man team (Silver - Gold)
body:
Hey,
Currently Gold 2
Thank you for taking your time in reading this post.
I am looking to see if I can put together or join and exciting group of players around silver and gold which we can play in tourney's etc together. Doesn't matter you're skill level, All about having fun as a 5 man group
Add me on League - ItsHavoc 

Cheers
